properties.cardCSS: background-color: var(--white); border: var(--borderSize) solid var(--lightGrey); border-radius: var(--borderRadius); color: var(--black); display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: var(--height); margin: 5px; position: relative; -webkit-text-size-adjust: 100%; width: var(--width);
properties.topBarCSS: border-bottom: var(--borderSize) solid var(--lightGrey); white-space: nowrap; overflow-x: clip;
properties.iconAreaCSS: color: var(--white); display: flex; height: 100%; justify-content: center; width: calc((var(--width) / 7) * 3); margin-top: 1.5%;
properties.bodyAreaCSS: display: flex; flex-direction: column; height: 100%; justify-content: center;
properties.bodyAreaTitleCSS: color: var(--lightColor) !important; position: absolute; font-size: 1rem; font-weight: 700; margin-left: 5%; text-align: left; padding-right: 1%; margin-top: 10%;
properties.bodyAreaTextCSS: color: var(--grey); font-size: 0.7rem; text-align: left; margin-left: 5%; margin-top: 24%; padding-right: 5%;
properties.bodyAreaText2CSS: position: absolute; var(--blue); font-size: 0.7rem; text-align: left; margin-left: 5%; margin-top: 45%; padding-right: 5%;
properties.userAreaCSS: position: static; align-items: center; display: flex; flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: nowrap; height: 25%;
properties.resultRowCSS: color: var(--grey); font-size: clamp(0.9rem, 1.2vw, 1.2rem); font-weight: 500; display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; padding: 0px 10px 0px 10px;
